dict.acceptation: 任何人，无论谁；随便哪一个人；
<口语>重要的人，有声名的人；平常人；

sent.orig: Anybody had that experience? Anybody here?
sent.trans: 谁有过这样的经历，在这儿谁有？

sent.orig: LIONEL:Ooh, no, no! Anybody can play! Anybody! Uh, real pirates are welcome. Arr, arrgh!
sent.trans: 哦不！每个人都可以玩！呃，我们欢迎真正的海盗。

sent.orig: I didn't hurt anybody. I didn't kill anybody. You play, you lose.
sent.trans: 我没有伤害任何人，我没有杀害任何人，你们做了恶，就要付出代价。

sent.orig: It's great. Anybody who is anybody will be at the party tonight.
sent.trans: 太棒了。今晚的宴会将有要人参加。

sent.orig: If there is anybody out there, anybody, please, you are not alone.
sent.trans: 如果有任何人在那里，任何人，你并不孤单。
